org.writeforward.logger.writers

Class MustacheFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.writeforward.logger.writers.MustacheFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter

    public class MustacheFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter
    Uses JMustache to format outgoing messages.
    Author:
    Matt

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public java.lang.String format(Message m)
        Formats the message using the supplied Mustache format.
        Specified by:
        format in interface Formatter
        Parameters:
        m - The completed message object.
        Returns:
        What will be written to the output file or stream unless using a SLF4J logger (like log4j) in which case this will use SLF4J methods for formatting.
